topic.title: Top of the Stairs
topic.shortdesc: Tops of the Stairs, or TOTS, as the cool kids call it, is the traditional place to end the night downtown

image.alt: My girlfriend Emma and I in front of the famous TOTS sign

li.p: Top of the Stairs is the top floor of a two-part business: downstairs is a restaurant called Bottom of the Stairs, while the top is a bar
This is where everyone goes to end the night with a bang, because of the three separate bars, dance floor, and lots of indoor and outdoor areas to hang out

Top of the Stairs is another place where my favorite beer is the cheapest one, however, the most popular on average is the Rail, a combination of a variety of liquors that is a great way to ruin one's night
If you somehow get hungry, you can get cheese-covered tater tots at almost any time of the night
